    • MedicalRecordManager

      public MedicalRecordManager(MedicalRecordDB database)
      Constructor to initialize the MedicalRecordManager with a database instance.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • addMedicalRecord

      public boolean addMedicalRecord(String patientId, MedicalRecord medicalRecord)
      Adds a new medical record for a patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the ID of the patient.
      medicalRecord - the medical record to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the record was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • updateMedicalRecord

      public boolean updateMedicalRecord(String patientId, Diagnosis diagnosis, Prescription prescription, Treatment treatment)
      Updates an existing medical record with new diagnosis, prescription, or treatment details.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the ID of the patient.
      diagnosis - the new diagnosis to be added.
      prescription - the new prescription to be added.
      treatment - the new treatment to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the record was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • deleteMedicalRecord

      public boolean deleteMedicalRecord(String patientId)
      Deletes a medical record of a patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the ID of the patient whose record is to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the record was successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • getMedicalHistory

      public String getMedicalHistory(String patientId)
      Retrieves the medical history of a patient as a formatted string.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the ID of the patient.
      Returns:
      a string describing the medical history, or null if no record is found.

    • updateContactInfo

      public boolean updateContactInfo(String patientId, String newPhoneNumber, String newEmailAddress)
      Updates the contact information for a patient in their medical record.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the ID of the patient.
      newPhoneNumber - the new phone number to update.
      newEmailAddress - the new email address to update.
      Returns:
      true if the contact information was successfully updated, false otherwise.
